title: How Singer-Songwriter Raveena Aurora Gets It Done
text:
Since debuting her first EP in 2017, Raveena Aurora has garnered a dedicated legion of fans thanks to her R&B, soul-inflected music and soft-spoken spirituality. The Queens-and-Connecticut-raised, Indian-American singer embarks on her first national tour this fall, one that she calls “the softest tour of all time.”

In this video, Raveena takes the Cut through a day in her life, explains the inspiration for her album, Lucid, discloses her favorite café in the city, and shares what being a musician of color means to her.

Doing the Most ﻿is a special series about ambition — how we define it, harness it, and conquer it.
description: The Indian-American singer on her new album ‘Lucid,’ being a musician of color, and favorite chai spot in the city.
